summary: Removes the cringe worthy dancing and clapping in taverns across Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Removes the cringe worthy dancing and clapping in taverns across Skyrim. Simply replaces the dancing and clapping animations with idle animations

Your welcome

[i]1: What are they doing? Dancing?[/i]
[i]2: That...I do not know[/i]

Recommended mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53491/?]Quieter Bards[/url] ~ Will stop Bards from signing horribly and forces them to play instrumental only

My other mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58137/?]Skyrim Realistic Archery[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58738/?]Scrolls Cast Instantly[/url]
author: SIDWULF
